languages.text: "Видите! Они уже готовы убивать нас! А мы ведь ничего еще даже не сделали! Нас не боятся!" {n}Желчь, исторгнутая изо рта Гнили, шипит на умах рабочих, словно кислота. Прожигает их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Видите! Они уже готовы убивать нас! А мы ведь ничего еще даже не сделали! Нас не боятся!" {n}Желчь, исторгнутая изо рта Гнили, шипит на умах рабочих, словно кислота. Прожигает их.{/n}

languages.text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Видите! Они уже готовы убивать нас! А мы ведь ничего еще даже не сделали! Нас не боятся!" {n}Желчь, исторгнутая изо рта Гнили, шипит на умах рабочих, словно кислота. Прожигает их.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

"You see! They are ready to kill us! And we haven't even done anything yet! They are not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spewed from Mildew's mouth sizzles on the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

"You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

"You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

languages.text: "Ihr könnt es sehen! Es juckt sie bereits, uns zu töten, dabei haben wir noch gar nichts getan! Sie haben keine Angst vor uns!" {n}Die Galle aus Fäules Mund zischt in den Geistern der Arbeiter wie Säure. Sie brennt sich hindurch.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ihr könnt es sehen! Es juckt sie bereits, uns zu töten, dabei haben wir noch gar nichts getan! Sie haben keine Angst vor uns!" {n}Die Galle aus Mehltaus Mund zischt in den Geistern der Arbeiter wie Säure. Sie brennt sich hindurch.{/n}

languages.text: «¿Lo veis? ¡Ya están deseando matarnos y aún no hemos hecho nada! ¡No nos tienen ningún miedo!». {n}La bilis que escupe Podredumbre arde en las mentes de los trabajadores como ácido. Está abriendo agujeros en ellos.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¿Lo veis? ¡Ya están deseando matarnos y aún no hemos hecho nada! ¡No nos tienen ningún miedo!». {n}La bilis que escupe Moho arde en las mentes de los trabajadores como ácido. Está abriendo agujeros en ellos.{/n}

languages.text: 「見ろ！まだ何もしていないというのに、奴らは俺たちを殺したくてうずうずしている！俺たちなんて怖くないのさ！」{n}ロットの口から吹き出す胆汁が、酸のように労働者たちの心をヒリヒリさせて…焼き尽くした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「見ろ！まだ何もしていないというのに、奴らは俺たちを殺したくてうずうずしている！俺たちなんて怖くないのさ！」{n}カビの口から吹き出す胆汁が、酸のように労働者たちの心をヒリヒリさせて…焼き尽くした。{/n}

languages.text: “你看！我们明明什么都没做，可他们已经迫不及待要杀光我们了！他们根本不怕我们！”{n}“脓疮”嘴里喷出的毒液，仿佛酸液一样在工人们的头脑中嘶嘶作响，将他们烧得通红。{/n}
languages.original_text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你看！我们明明什么都没做，可他们已经迫不及待要杀光我们了！他们根本不怕我们！”{n}“霉毯”嘴里喷出的毒液，仿佛酸液一样在工人们的头脑中嘶嘶作响，将他们烧得通红。{/n}

languages.text: « Vous voyez ! Ça les démange déjà de nous tuer, alors que nous n'avons encore rien fait ! Ils n'ont pas peur de nous ! » {n}La bile que crache la bouche de Pourriture dissout l'esprit des ouvriers comme de l'acide. Elle s'infiltre en eux.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Vous voyez ! Ça les démange déjà de nous tuer, alors que nous n'avons encore rien fait ! Ils n'ont pas peur de nous ! » {n}La bile que crache la bouche de Moisissure dissout l'esprit des ouvriers comme de l'acide. Elle s'infiltre en eux.{/n}

languages.text: "Gördünüz işte! Bizi öldürmek için can atıyorlar. Bizse daha hiçbir şey yapmadık! Bizden korkmuyorlar!" {n}Çürük'ün dudaklarından yayılan kin, işçilerin zihinlerini asit misali öfkeyle doldurarak onları içten içe yakıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "You see! They're already itching to kill us, and we haven't even done anything yet! They're not afraid of us!" {n}The bile spraying from Rot's mouth sizzles in the workers' minds like acid. It is burning them through.{/n}
